title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 615.1 - Purpose, scope and applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 615.1 - Purpose, scope and applicability

State Regulations
(a) The purpose of this Part is to provide a
means for assuring the participation of minorities and women as workers and
businesses in programs funded or assisted by the New York State Environmental

Quality Bond Act of 1986. (b) This

Part is applicable to programs implemented under authority of article 52, titles 1, 3, 5 and 7 of the Environmental Conservation Law (ECL). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
615.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
